verses.name: Psalms 75:1
verses.text: Unto thee, O God, do we give thanks, unto thee do we give thanks: for that thy name is near thy wondrous works declare.

verses.name: Psalms 75:2
verses.text: When I shall receive the congregation I will judge uprightly.

verses.name: Psalms 75:3
verses.text: The earth and all the inhabitants thereof are dissolved: I bear up the pillars of it. Selah.

verses.name: Psalms 75:4
verses.text: I said unto the fools, Deal not foolishly: and to the wicked, Lift not up the horn:

verses.name: Psalms 75:5
verses.text: Lift not up your horn on high: speak not with a stiff neck.

verses.name: Psalms 75:6
verses.text: For promotion cometh neither from the east, nor from the west, nor from the south.
